review: Nice product.  Loved the simplicity.  I really only got it to play Amazon Prime videos, as it was the one thing lacking in my Samsung DVD player.  It does a good job streaming and the picture quality is good. I do wish it had some type of infra-red adapter or sensor, so I could use a universal remote.  Any time I want to watch Prime videos, I have the use two remotes.  Might look into getting a Roku HD.
